thread.title: BRIEF-Juniper Networks gets Letter From U.S. Department Of Justice

title: BRIEF-Juniper Networks gets Letter From U.S. Department Of Justice

organizations.name: letter from u.s. department of justice reuters

text:
February 9, 2018 / 2:17 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Juniper Networks gets Letter From U.S. Department Of Justice Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Juniper Networks Inc: 
* JUNIPER NETWORKS SAYS IT GOT LETTER FROM U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE NOTIFYING OF DOJâ€˜S CLOSING OF A PREVIOUSLY DISCLOSED INVESTIGATION BY CO - SEC FILING 
* JUNIPER NETWORKS - DOJ CLOSED INVESTIGATION INTO POSSIBLE VIOLATIONS BY CO OF U.S. FOREIGN CORRUPT PRACTICES ACT WITHOUT TAKING ANY ACTION AGAINST CO Source text: ( bit.ly/2EdYVBx ) Further company coverage:
